Question: Shenzhen Hotack Technology Co., Ltd. CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Hotack Technology Co., Ltd

Projector

- DLP and LCD projector manufacturer
- Offers smart DLP projectors, home storage devices, TV boxes, and other digital devices
- Provides global ODM/OEM services based on Rockchip 3126, 3188, 3288, 3326, 3368, and 3399
- Features include 4K hard decoding, dual-band Wifi 6, auto keystone correction, and 180° free projection
- Products have passed CCC, CE, FCC, RoHS, HDMI certifications
- Employs over 40 professional software and hardware technical engineers
- Founded in 2007, with a focus on designing, developing, manufacturing, and marketing smart products
- Will be exhibiting at CES 2024, booth 52465, showcasing new projectors including GTV models, ultra-short-throw models, and laser projectors
Summary_cn:
深圳热泰科技有限公司

投影仪

- DLP和液晶投影仪制造商
- 提供智能DLP投影仪、家庭存储设备、电视盒等数字设备
- 基于Rockchip 3126、3188、3288、3326、3368和3399提供全球ODM/OEM服务
- 功能包括4K硬解码、双频Wifi 6、自动梯形校正和180°自由投影
- 产品通过CCC、CE、FCC、RoHS、HDMI认证
- 聘用了40多名专业软件和硬件技术工程师
- 成立于2007年，专注于设计、开发、制造和销售智能产品
- 将展示新款投影仪，包括GTV型号、超短焦型号和激光投影仪，参展于2024年CES展会，展位号52465
